intro.dialog_rand2: If it isn't our most loyal of subjects.

intro.dialog: Her Majesty, Snowball The First, hath returned to grace her presence upon thee.
Her Highness has a task of which only the likes of thyself can accomplish.

intro.dialog_rand1: It appears that our royal treasurer, yours truly, hath misplaced our most royal treasure.
intro.dialog_rand2: It seems the location of our most royal treasure hath been lost to the cycle of eternal rain.

intro.dialog: As our most loyal subject, thine aid is imperative to our search.

intro_defect.dialog: If thou aren't The Princess of Void and her matron chaperone before mine very eye.
Her Majesty, Queen of Frostmites.|L||!||wave|The pleasure is all yours.
Thou hath lost something important as well?

intro_defect.dialog_rand1: It appears that our royal treasurer, yours truly, hath misplaced our most royal treasure.
intro_defect.dialog_rand2: It seems the location of our most royal treasure hath been lost to the cycle of eternal rain.

intro_defect.dialog: Defect darling, we simply must help Her Highness search for this royal treasure.

comment_leave.dialog: Her Majesty fears the treasure may not be here after all.

start_battle.dialog: We shall grant thee access into our royal dreams once more.
Surely, the answers we seek are held within.

no_battle.dialog: It seems that Her Majesty hath made a grave error.
The royal treasure is in a different location entirely.
Worry not! For another opportunity shall arise in the future.

return_intro.dialog: A marvelous display of thine wonderous somnipathy.
Along with the location of the royal treasure, a collection of |C3|[VAL1] Royal Motes|C0| was also recovered.

return_intro.dialog_rand1: Her Highness shall knight thee, Treasurer of Dreams!
return_intro.dialog_rand2: Her Majesty shall knight thee, Somnific Accountant!
return_intro.dialog_rand3: Her Highness shall knight thee, Curator of Slumber!
return_intro.dialog_rand4: Her Majesty shall knight thee, Somnifacient Treasurer!

return_intro.dialog: Now, to uncover the royal treasure.
|shake||C3|Dig Dig Dig Dig Dig|L|Dig Dig Dig Dig Dig|C0|

gift_taken.dialog_rand1: Her Majesty insists thou receive another treasure.
gift_taken.dialog_rand2: The royal treasure is bountiful.|L||!|Please, partake in another.
gift_taken.dialog_rand3: Her Highness shall always share the wealth amongst her subjects.
gift_taken.dialog_rand4: The royal treasure is plentiful.|L||!|Thou must take another piece.

leave_blank.dialog: Thine warmth is beyond the scope of Her Majesty's vocabulary.
Thou shall now become her royal thermostat.
Other frostmites are fools to deny such warmth.

leave_defect.dialog: These royal gifts have been bestowed upon thee.|!| With them, thou must defend the Princess of Void.
Just as she protects thyself with her most royal of gifts.
We must protect each other, my little Defect.
We will do our best... Your    Majesty?
Well spoken, my most loyal subject.

leave_twins.dialog: Her Majesty senses admiration for mites of the highest order from thy most green haired Zaraden.
Worry not. For Her Highness grants access to thee, the royal cuddler.
We'll be here for a while, huh?

leave_devil.dialog: I wish there was a Zaraden ruler like you.
Ours don't do nothin for no one.
Fear not my loyal subject, for Her Majesty, Snowball The First, shall be your ruler from now on.

leave_devil.dialog_rand1: Her Highness shall declare thee, The Symphony of Destruction.
leave_devil.dialog_rand2: Her Highness shall declare thee, The Holy Diver.
leave_devil.dialog_rand3: Her Highness shall declare thee, The Thing That Should Not Be.
leave_devil.dialog_rand4: Her Highness shall declare thee, The Stairway to Hell.

leave_devil.dialog: Yeah! Forget those dumb old Zaraden!|L||!|The Pit rocks harder than anything in those towers.

leave_default.dialog: Her Highness hath made a revelation.
Her Majesty's true royal treasure was her most loyal subjects all along.
